statements: SELECT * FROM energy_monitoring;
SELECT renewable_production, energy_consumption FROM energy_monitoring;
SELECT timestamp, renewable_production, energy_consumption FROM energy_monitoring WHERE renewable_production > 100;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM energy_monitoring ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, renewable_production, energy_consumption FROM energy_monitoring WHERE energy_consumption < 50;
SELECT id, timestamp, renewable_production, energy_consumption FROM energy_monitoring WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM energy_monitoring WHERE energy_consumption > 100 AND renewable_production < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT renewable_production, energy_consumption FROM energy_monitoring WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT id, renewable_production, energy_consumption FROM energy_monitoring WHERE renewable_production > energy_consumption;
SELECT id, timestamp, renewable_production, energy_consumption FROM energy_monitoring ORDER BY renewable_production DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM production
SELECT production_id, production_type FROM production WHERE production_value > 100
SELECT production_type, production_value FROM production ORDER BY production_value DESC
SELECT DISTINCT production_type FROM production
SELECT production_id, production_type, production_value FROM production WHERE production_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT * FROM production WHERE production_value > 100 ORDER BY production_type DESC
SELECT production_id, production_type FROM production WHERE production_value < 50 ORDER BY production_id ASC
SELECT production_id, production_type, production_value FROM production WHERE production_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY production_id DESC, production_type ASC
SELECT production_type, production_value FROM production ORDER BY production_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM consumption WHERE consumption_id % 2 = 0 ORDER BY consumption_value
SELECT * FROM Production;
SELECT production_id, production_timestamp FROM Production ORDER BY production_timestamp DESC;
SELECT consumption_device, consumption_amount FROM Consumption WHERE consumption_amount > 100;
SELECT production_timestamp, consumption_timestamp FROM GridBalance WHERE balance_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT production_id, production_amount FROM Production WHERE production_source = 'Solar' ORDER BY production_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Production ORDER BY production_id DESC;
SELECT production_source, production_amount FROM Production WHERE production_amount > 1000;
SELECT consumption_device, consumption_amount FROM Consumption ORDER BY consumption_id ASC;
SELECT p.production_id, c.consumption_device FROM Production p INNER JOIN Consumption c ON p.production_id = c.consumption_id;
SELECT MAX(production_amount) AS max_production_amount, MIN(production_amount) AS min_production_amount FROM Production;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT production_source, production_capacity FROM renewable_energy_production ORDER BY production_capacity DESC;
SELECT consumption_device, consumption_amount FROM renewable_energy_consumption WHERE consumption_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM energy_providers WHERE provider_type = 'Solar';
SELECT balanced FROM grid_balance WHERE balanced < 0 ORDER BY balance_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production ORDER BY production_timestamp DESC, production_capacity ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT production_source, SUM(production_capacity) AS total_capacity FROM renewable_energy_production GROUP BY production_source HAVING total_capacity > 100;
SELECT consumption_device, consumption_amount FROM renewable_energy_consumption WHERE consumption_amount > 500 ORDER BY consumption_amount DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM energy_providers WHERE provider_type = 'Solar' OR provider_type = 'Wind' ORDER BY provider_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM grid_balance WHERE balanced < 0
SELECT * FROM production ORDER BY production_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, location, production_amount FROM production WHERE production_amount > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, location, production_timestamp FROM production WHERE location = 'New York' AND production_amount < 50 ORDER BY production_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, location, production_amount FROM production WHERE production_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND production_timestamp < '2022-02-01 00:00:00';
SELECT id, location, production_amount FROM production WHERE location IN ('California', 'Texas') ORDER BY production_amount DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM production ORDER BY production_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, production_amount FROM production WHERE production_amount > 100 ORDER BY production_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM consumption WHERE consumption_amount < 50 AND location = 'Europe' ORDER BY consumption_timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, source_name, source_capacity FROM renewable_sources WHERE source_capacity > 500 ORDER BY source_capacity ASC;
SELECT id, balance_type, balance_amount, balance_timestamp FROM grid_balancing WHERE balance_amount < 0 ORDER BY balance_timestamp DESC;
